title: "Fast responses to images of animate and inanimate objects in the nonhuman primate amygdala"
excerpt: "Visual information reaches the amygdala through the various stages of the ventral visual stream. There is, however, evidence that a fast subcortical pathway for the processing of emotional visual input exists."
